summary: The diff shows only a modification to project_state.json with no evidence of actual deployment, configuration changes, canister settings, or mainnet deployment artifacts. All five requirements (REQ-50 through REQ-54) appear to be missing from the implementation.

missing_requirements.requirement: Deploy both backend and frontend canisters to the Internet Computer mainnet network using `dfx deploy --network ic`
missing_requirements.reason: No evidence of deployment configuration, dfx.json network settings, canister_ids.json, or any deployment-related changes in the diff

missing_requirements.requirement: Verify the deployed mainnet frontend can successfully connect to the deployed mainnet backend canister and load all core application data
missing_requirements.reason: No evidence of mainnet canister ID configuration, actor initialization changes, or network-specific frontend configuration

missing_requirements.requirement: Verify Internet Identity authentication works correctly on the mainnet deployment
missing_requirements.reason: No evidence of Internet Identity mainnet configuration, authentication flow changes, or production environment settings

missing_requirements.requirement: Verify all static assets including generated brainrot-themed images are correctly deployed and accessible from the mainnet frontend canister
missing_requirements.reason: No evidence of asset deployment configuration, public folder changes, or asset canister settings

missing_requirements.requirement: Configure production-appropriate canister settings for the mainnet deployment including sufficient cycles allocation
missing_requirements.reason: No evidence of canister settings configuration, cycles management, compute allocation, memory allocation, or monitoring setup

hallucinated_features.description: Update to project_state.json with incremented projectStateVersion
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not request any modifications to project_state.json or metadata updates. This appears to be a metadata tracking change unrelated to the deployment requirements
